definitions.definition: An extremely hard mineral , a form of aluminum oxide with the chemical formula Al 2 O 3 , that occurs in the form of the gemstones sapphire and ruby ; it is used as an abrasive .

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) An extremely hard mineral , a form of aluminum oxide with the chemical formula Al 2 O 3 , that occurs in the form of the gemstones sapphire and ruby ; it is used as an abrasive .
